name: X-HERO: Idle Avengers
description:
*2020 Fantastic Idle Comic RPG is online NOW!*
Be ready to dive into this fantasitc world of comic superheroes! Don't miss this super cool card game if you're a fan of idle RPG game or superhero comics! Summon superheroes and win your own legends in the future space war!

GAME FEATURES:

*Fantastic Comic Art Style*
Be ready for tons of stunning images of Heores presented in comic art style! Players could enjoy fantastic animated battle scenes where different superheroes fight with amazing effects and sounds! Definitely a boon not to be missed for comic lovers!

*AFK&IDLE SYSTEM*
Set your marvelous heroes training while away, and upgrade your AFK superheroes without much effort! Whether you're on the way to work or taking a break, you can battle in wars anytime!

*DEVELOPING STRATEGY*
Hundreds of superheroes with specific skills in different factions for you to choose! Summon your heroes, compose strategy, develop heroes skills and equipment to secure victory in the future hero wars!

*BUILD AN ELITE TEAM OF AVENGERS*
Assemble a mighty idle team of avengers for the future war! Cunning Raiders, tough Warriors, powerful Supermen, speedy Rangers, Mages with magic and reliable Supports... From the selection and training of avengers, to their position in the team, you are the one who make decisions!

*TONS OF ADVENTURE*
Choose your marvelous adventure in this RPG game! Either battling for glory in the global arena, exploring hidden treasures in Space Discovery, or even hunting the injustice in the space!

*CROSS-SERVER Wars*
Play with millions players across the planet in this multiplayers game! Compete and determine who shall lead the future world to fight back darkness in this war!

Download this online game and be ready for an exciting journey to the future world of X-HERO: Idle Avengers!
